description: Level 2 of Impel Down, known as Beast Hell, is a dangerous level filled with various powerful beasts including Manticores, Puzzle Scorpions, and the Basilisk. The level is guarded by the mighty Sphinx. Prisoners on this level are hunted by these creatures as part of their torture.

keyEvents.title: Luffy, Buggy and Galdino Battle Through Level 2
keyEvents.description: The trio fights through the dangerous beasts of Level 2 while trying to find passage to the lower levels.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases the escalating dangers of Impel Down's levels.

keyEvents.title: The Sphinx Guardian Appears
keyEvents.description: The Sphinx, guardian of Level 2, confronts the intruders with its unique noodle-speaking quirk.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the memorable guardian of this level.

keyEvents.title: Floor Destroyed Leading to Level 3
keyEvents.description: The Sphinx's powerful attacks destroy the floor, causing everyone to fall to Level 3.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of Level 2 and transition to Level 3.

statusHistory.reason: Functioning prison level with guardian beasts

description: Level 3 of Impel Down, known as Starvation Hell, is where prisoners are given minimal food and water, slowly wasting away. The level is characterized by extreme heat from Level 4 below, which adds to the suffering of inmates. This is where Luffy, Buggy, and Galdino land after falling through Level 2.

keyEvents.title: Falling to Level 3
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Buggy, Galdino, and the Sphinx crash through the floor from Level 2 and arrive in Level 3.
keyEvents.significance: First introduction to Level 3 and progression deeper into Impel Down.

description: Level 6 of Impel Down, known as Eternal Hell, is the deepest and most secure level where the world's most dangerous criminals are held. Prisoners here have bounties exceeding 100 million berries or have committed crimes so atrocious that the World Government erases them from history. The only way to leave Level 6 is through execution. This level houses prisoners like Ace, Jinbe, Crocodile, and other legendary criminals.

keyEvents.title: Jinbe Revealed in Level 6
keyEvents.description: Jinbe is revealed as the Warlord imprisoned alongside Ace in Level 6.
keyEvents.significance: Major character debut and reveals the caliber of prisoners held in Eternal Hell.

keyEvents.title: Level 6 Prisoners Express Desire to Kill Whitebeard
keyEvents.description: Crocodile and other inmates discuss their ambitions to kill Whitebeard during the upcoming war.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the threat posed by these legendary prisoners and raises stakes for the war.

keyEvents.title: Information About Eternal Hell Revealed
keyEvents.description: Guards explain the nature of Level 6 - housing criminals erased from history who can only leave through execution.
keyEvents.significance: Provides crucial world-building about how the World Government handles the most dangerous criminals.

statusHistory.reason: Functioning as highest security prison level
